page.title: 08International University
page.content: The Intenational University, Europe, is located in square 05120196 and occupies the site an buildings originally owned by the Senior Royal Masonic School for Boys. It covers approximately 100 acres. The buildings were erected in the late Victorian era and the maonic school opened in l900. It provided residential education for orphans of Freemasons. The buildings present an impressive complex with the Gothic Bell Tower forming a landmark together with the flint faced chapel. The campus consists of a central grassed quadrangle surrounded by brick buildings linked by covered walkways. Many extensive modern buildings have been added by the University to provide advanced educational facilities for sciences and civil engineering. The University is part of a consortium based at San Diego, USA.
